word_mean: 人参：人参属(Panax)的草本植物，尤其是指中国的人参(P. schinseng)和美国的西洋参(P. quinquefolius)，中国人用其根作为滋补药、兴奋药和催欲药
人参根：中国的或美国的人参根

sentence.Network_en: The word "ginseng" comes from the Chinese word "ren-shen".
sentence.Network_cn: ginseng这个词来自汉语的“人参”。

sentence.Network_en: He hoped to strike it rich by investing in ginseng.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望通过投资人参发大财。

sentence.Network_en: You can also take red ginseng in convenient tablet or capsule form.
sentence.Network_cn: 你也可以选择便于服用的红参片或红参胶囊。

西伯利亚人参(Siberian Ginseng)又称为"刺五加"，是人参的远亲。虽然知名度不及人参，但实际上刺五加亦有同等的神气效用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Chinese rénshēn, from rén 'man' + shēn, a kind of herb (because of the supposed resemblance of the forked root to a person)

entry.def: Ginseng is the root of a plant found in China, Korea, and America which some people believe is good for your health.

means.word_mean: 2. Chinese herb with palmately compound leaves and small greenish flowers and forked aromatic roots believed to have medicinal powers
